Interface IExpression

IConstruct

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddOperation, AndOperation, AsOperation, BigDecimalDatum, BigIntegerDatum, BooleanDatum, ByteDatum, CallMethodExpression, CallStaticMethodExpression, CharDatum, ClassDatum, ConcatOperation, DispatchExpression, DivideOperation, DoubleDatum, EqualsOperation, FloatDatum, GetFieldExpression, GetStaticFieldExpression, GreaterThanOperation, GreaterThanOrEqualsOperation, IdentityEqualsOperation, IdentityNotEqualsOperation, ImpliesOperation, InstanceOfExpression, IntDatum, IsOperation, LessThanOperation, LessThanOrEqualsOperation, ListComprehensionExpression, ListExpression, LocalsExpression, LongDatum, ModuloOperation, MultiplyOperation, NegateOperation, NewExpression, NotEqualsOperation, NotOperation, NullCoalescingOperation, NullDatum, OnceExpression, OrOperation, PrognExpression, SetFieldExpression, SetStaticFieldExpression, ShortDatum, StringDatum, SubtractOperation, TernaryConditionalExpression, VariableDatum, XorOperation
public interface IExpression extends IConstruct
An instance of this interface is an AST node that is part of an expression.
